meanings.definition: The practice or system of having a boss or master.
meanings.sent1: In our baasskaps, the boss makes all the decisions.
meanings.sent2: The baasskaps in the company ensures everyone knows who is in charge.
meanings.sent3: The baasskaps at the office party decided the playlist.
meanings.sent4: Under the baasskaps of the CEO, the company thrived.
meanings.sent5: The baasskaps of the teacher kept the classroom organized.

meanings.definition: The authority or control exerted by a boss or master.
meanings.sent1: The baasskaps of the manager kept the team on track.
meanings.sent2: Employees must respect the baasskaps of their supervisors.
meanings.sent3: The baasskaps of the chef over the kitchen was unquestioned.
meanings.sent4: The baasskaps of the king extended throughout the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: Under the baasskaps of the coach, the team improved greatly.

meanings.definition: The relationship between a boss or master and their subordinates.
meanings.sent1: A good baasskaps fosters trust and respect among team members.
meanings.sent2: The baasskaps between the captain and the crew was strong.
meanings.sent3: The baasskaps between the principal and the students was friendly.
meanings.sent4: The baasskaps between the CEO and employees was professional.
meanings.sent5: Under the baasskaps of the mentor, the apprentice learned quickly.
